Package Core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bolt
    The class bolt allows an object to be locked in the game For example a chest or a door
    Chest
    The Class Chest The class Chest creates a Chest with a Bolt.
    Code
    Code extends from Bolt The class Code creates a lock with a password to unlock it.
    DirectionWords
    DirectionWords is a class that contains the directions allowed in the Game Murder in GPHY
    Door
    The Class Door This class creates a Door that links 2 Rooms This door has a boolean that shows if it is opened or not.
    Enigma
    Class Enigme This Class creates an Enigma.
    EnigmaItem

    PNJ  
    Room
    Room is the class representing a room, in a building for example.
